div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene' tenta in pretorio eiusdem
tercio die mensis Julij Anno quosupra

The said' Alexander blinseile Come souerte for the wif of Jonhne low to the
bailyeis that gif mathow branche previs the tua laxis his that the said' Jonhne
lowis' hwif has in hir possessioun' that the said' fische or the awaile of thame
salbe furthtcumand' to the said' mathow

The said' day Williame Scrogis wobster was In amerciament of the
court for the wrangwis' strublance of Duncan baxter be ane suorne
assis' patrik andersone forspekar and tile Amend' as law will and' forber'
in tyme tocum

Johannes Cullane Thomas fyf thomas leslie Willelmus portar patricius leslie Jacobus
Kyntor Willelmus Wormet Johannes Steuinsone Duncanus craik Willelmus andirsone
senior Andreas cristeson' thomas Watsone Johannes andirson' Willelmus gray et Johannes
philp burgenses dicti burgi Jurati dicunt quod quondam Jacobus Andirson' frater Willelmj andirson' latoris
obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis
quadam terra Jacente infra dicti burgi in vico Inferiore ecclesie ex boreali parte eiusdem vici
inter terram Johannis talyour Crukschank ex orientali et terram domini Johannis litstar ex occidentali partibus
ab altera et communionem viam regiam versus austrum et terram mathei Wricht versus boriam
Et quod dictus Willelmus andirson' est legittimus et propinquior heres dicti qondam Jacobi patris suj de
dicta terra cum pertinenciis Et quod est legittime etatis Et quod dicta terra valet nunc per annum xx s'
et valuit tantum tempore pacis Et quod tenetur in Capite de Suppremo domino nostro
Rege per servicium burgagium Et nunc existit In manibus mariote andirson' per decessum
dicti quondam Jacobi sed nesciunt qualiter per spacium xxvj annorum aut eocirca et cetera

Iidem jurati dicint dicunt quod quondam Andreas scrogis frater Willelmi scrogis latoris presencium
obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus ut defe de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri Regis
de quadam terra Interiore Cum pertinenciis Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico Castrj ex
australi parte eiusdem vici inter terram alexandri mar' ex orientali et terram Johannis chamer
ex occidentali et terram anteriorem thome chapman versus boriam et torrentem sancte
trinitatis versus Austrum Et quod dictus Willelmus est legittimus et propinquior heres dicti
quondam Andree fratris suj de dicta terra cum pertinenciis Et quod est legittime etatis Et
quod dicta terra valet nunc per annum xl s' et valuit duas marcas tempore
pacis Et quod tenetur in capite de Suppremo domino nostro Rege per seruicium
burgagium Et nunc existit In manibus domini nostri Regis Alexandri Scrogis patris suj liberum tenementum eiusdem hu pro toto tempore vite sue per spacium
aut eocirca In defectu veri heredis Jus suum hucusque minime prosequentis

Iidem Jurati dicunt quod quondam Walterus Rolland frater domini Johannis rolland'
Capellanj latoris presencium obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem
et fidem domini nostri Regis de qua terra Jacente infra dictum burgum in vico
Castrj ex australi parte eiusdem inter terram quondam alexandri menyes ex australi
et terram Richardi Wricht ex boreali Et quod dictus dominus Johannes est legittimus et
propinquior heres dicti quondam Walterj fratris suj de dicta terra cum pertinenciis
Et quod est legittime etatis Et quod dicta terra valet nunc per annum xx s'
et valuit xiij s' et iiij d' tempore pacis Et quod tenetur in capite
de suppremo domino nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium Et nunc existit
In manibus Et nunc existit In manibus patricij Rede virtute cuiusdam carte sigillo
quondam Andree branche tunc vnius balliuorum dicti burgi domini nostri Regis per spacium trium mensium aut eocirca per
decessum mariorie menyeis coniunctam infeodacionem eiusdem terre
habentis datum et clausum sub Sigillo Johannis mar' vnius balliuorum
dicti burgi ac Sigillis quorundam qui huic Inquisicionj intererant faciend'

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem sexto die mensis
Julij anno quo Supra

The said' day It was deliuerit be thir personis vndir writin suorne in ane
assis' Jonhne of Cullane thomas prat thomas fyf Androw murray William
blinsele Androw ancroft Dauy mar' William goldsmitht William gray patry
chernsid' Johne chapman Johne Steuinson' John annand' Johne of Kyntor' and
Dauy Spens be the moutht of the said' Johne' of Cullan forspekar of the
said' assis' that William blinsel Coupar hed' done wrangit in the done quhen
he keyst done takin of his wall becaus' he warnit nocht William Wormet his nychtbur' obefor
to haue propit his wall and to haue kepit It fra skathtis

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem x die Julij
anno quo Supra

the said' day the aldirman and ballieis relevit and lousit the arrest
maid' apone the malys of the land' debatable' betuix Dauid club
Dauid mar' to the said' Dauid and Johne of Cullan come souerte
to the aldirman and balyeis to be Responsale for the said' malys to
the partj quhome It efferis gif ony beis fundin haffand' mair'
richt tharto thane the said' Dauy club

the said' day the Court wardit schew for' law and gevin for
dome that Normond' of leslie hed' lauchfullie preuit that he hed'
the half of Johne Duncansonis yerd in tak for this Instant
yer'

The said day Canny Duncanson protestit Solemptlie for hir costis
skathtis and remed' of law throw the want of the said' half yerd
Recouerit be Normond' of leslie

the said' day Jonhne huchonsone schew he was attachit be Androw
nachtj seriand' to comper to ansuer' at the Instance of mathow Red'
becaus' the said' mathow Comperit nocht to follow him he protestit
to be quyt of his clame quhile he be new warnit and for his costis
et cetera

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
xvij die Julij Anno quo Supra

the saide day Sandy mv moresone offerit to Johne
Duncansone ane franche crovne the quhilk he refusit
for penny worthtis bocht and resauit fra the said' Johne

Eodem die Andreas anfray deuenit plegius legalis per manus
sue dextere ostensionem terras ac bona quod Willelmus anfra frater suus
erit Indempnis pro eo et parte sua quam Impedire potest aliter quam
per viam Juris Et Willelmus anfray deuenit plegius legalis per manus
sue ostensionem terras et bona quod dictus Andreas erit Indempnis pro
eo et parte sua quam Impedire potest aliter quam per viam Juris

Curia balliuorum burgj de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem
xxvijo die mensis Julij Anno quosupra

The saide day the ballies assignit mononday that nixt cumis to
philp Clerk to preif that he hed' put ane barrell of salmond'
to Jhone' stevinson' quhilkis was awing to him be the said' philp

The said' day thomas Narne grantit that he wald' haue tane
xxiiij s' fra Jhon' sclatar at Witsonday and' is reddy yet to tak it

Curia balliuorum burgj de Aberdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem tercio
die mensis Ju Augustj Anno quosupra

The said' day the Court wardit and schew for law that Robert Rudman
sale pay to Androw low burges of Aberdene the awaile of viij chalder
of lyme and ane half quhilkis it gef betuix pasche and Witsonday
eftir the tenour of the said' Robert Rudmannis obligacion' maid' to him
tharapone' and that was gevin for dome be the moutht of philp Dunbrek
dempstar for the tyme quhilkis the ballies chargit to pay within terme of law

The said' day the bailyheis assignit friday that nixt cummis as day
of peremptour to philp clerk to preive his pament of ane barrell
to Jhon' stevinsone

The said' day Robert Rudman fand' patrik lesly souerte to pay to Androw
low the awaile of vj chalder of lyme within terme of law

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
vij die Augusti

The said' day It was statut and ordanit be the aldirman balyeis
and Counsale present for the tyme that ale baxtaris within this burghe
sall baik ale franche flour' Seueralie It allane / ale Inglis
quhet It allane / ale franche quhet allane ale Scottis
quhet It allane in weilbakin Stuf to serue the tone vndir
the pane of Eschetis of thar' bredis and of ane amerciament of the
Court vnforgevin and forthir vndir the pane of law

The saide day It was statut' and ordanit be the aldirman balyeis and
Consal present for the tyme that ale vnfre broustaris within this
burghe sal pan brew vj d' the gallone and gif it be nocht wortht
vj d' it salbe set to iiij d' the gallone And al fre broustaris
sal brew viij d' aill the gallon' and gif It be nocht wortht It
salbe set to vj d' the gallone And' the seriandis and Cunnaris sal
pas' oukly and tast the aile and Set It as It is of avale
as it is

The saide day the borghe Strekit be Jonhne talyour one Androw nachty
for the wranguys' haldin fra him of ane par of hoys' was fundin
of nane avale be ane Suorne assis' thomas leslie forspekar
for the quhilkis the saide Jonhne was in ane Amerciament of the courtis
et cetera and the saide Androw quhit of his challance

The said' day philp Clerk oblist him to stand' and abid'
at the deliuerance and ordinance of Jonhne chapman Anent
the pament of ane barrell of Salmond' aucht to Jonhne steuinson'

The xv day of the moneth' of August the yer forsaid' It was statut and
ordanit be the Alderman baillies Counsaile and communite present for the tyme
Representand' the body of the towne for the sawite and weilfar of the
town' fra ale sthrange seknes that ale persoum' persoun'
that Come within this schip
Callit that now Come out of Danskin suld' Remane
within thar hous' and lugeng for the space of fyftene dais nixt her'eftir and
thar seruandis beand' within the samyn vnto the tyme it be knavin
quhat seknes the said' personis has vnder the pane of Eschet of thar
gudis And' the Adirman Aldirman ballies and officiaris of the town' sall charge personis
to Remane in thar hous' and lugingis in our souerane lordis nayme as said is
and ale necessar thingis salbe minsterit and gevin to thame

The xxj day of August the yer' forsaid' It was Statut'
and ordanit for the escheving of the plage of pestlence and safte
of this tone that thir hous' vndir writin and al personis being within
tham that Is to say the hous' of Duncan Colison' Johne Colison'
Johne of Cullan Gilleys' Alexander hay Jonhne Syme Cristiane
fechat Anny traill Dauy club thome of myding the hous'
of Jonet Dovny that wand' torne Malcum Crag gilbert
litstar Johne Arthour' patry Andirsone Jonhne fechat Jonhne
Rede hatmakar Jonhne Ramsay Richerd' Waus in the Castalgat
Thome Ridall Johne Wilyongsone the hous' of Will ranison'
for cheishame William lammynton' for Willekin laurence talyour
the woman of Willekin and hir modir Ande the hous' of Johne
brogane and murthow blak salbe closit for the space of xv dais
next hereftir Ande ale vthir personis that the aldirman and the officiaris
chargis and nocht to Cum vteuthe thar' hous' and lugeingis vndir
the pane of ded' And' the kystis that come out of this schip
that come now of lait fra Danskin to patrik Andirsone be
brynt And' that nay ale personis that come hame in the saide schip
keip thame Inclusit in thar hous' for the space of xv
dais vndir the pane of ded' becaus' the said' personis and thar
hous' befor' writin reset part of the said' personis and thar'
gudis and was vpgevin be ane Suorne Inquest
And' quhay that wantis ony Sustentacioun the tone
sal minster to thame nedfull thingis quhilk statut' and'
common' ordinance was maid' be the hale aldirman balyeis
Counsal and communite of this burghe in ane voce concerdand' and
opinly Red' herd' and vndirstandin

Curia capitalis burgi de Abirdene tenta super montem castrj
eiusdem quinto die mensis Octobris Anno Domini Millesimo et quingentesimo

Eodem die Johannes ruthirfurd' miles Electus fuit in officium
prepositure pro Anno Instante

Eodem die thomas leslie Johannes mar' Richardus Waus et
Willelmus Wormet electi fuerunt in officium balliuorum pro anno
Instante prestitis Solitis Juramentis

Eodem die Andreas nachtj Willelmus scrimgeor' gilbertus prestone et
Johannes gray electi fuerunt in officium seriandorum pro anno Instante
prestitis Solitis Juramentis
